name: Super Captain Sall Guttmann
description:
captain sall guttmann like its all good man

FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED

Controls:

AD for lateral movement

WASD for ladder movement

Left Shift for roll move

land on enemy win

press h if youre on level 1 to reset

Versions:

1.0- Launch day build (November 5th, 2021)

Made for the CCCJAM 2020 ("Playing both sides")

3rd part assets:

-"Farland Skies - Clowdy Crown" by Borodar

All other assets made by Rig Labs, owned by Black Frog Studios

made in like 6 hours or something idk
